set terminal png size 800,600
set output '16.png'
set multiplot layout 1,1 rowsfirst title "PSO after 16 steps"
set xlabel 'dimension 0'
set ylabel 'dimension 1'
set xrange [-254.96236431295:200]
set yrange [-107.9458340072:84.126077988529]
set arrow from 50.946993151615,-32.526959882485 to 71.421278323743,-59.486151748837
set arrow from 3.9746718160732,10.079902199276 to 3.860611784087,16.419233082254

set arrow from -18.726087633118,-2.9006949369575 to -32.157171156917,18.277612489367
set label "(0)" at 50.946993151615,-32.526959882485

set label "(2)" at 4.9113450687747,-7.0465900919806
set label "(3)" at -18.726087633118,-2.9006949369575
set grid
set arrow from -100,-100 to 100,-100 nohead
set arrow from -100,-100 to -100,84.126077988529 nohead
set arrow from 100,-100 to 100,84.126077988529 nohead
plot   '-' using 1:2 with lines title 'best global attractor footprints', '-' using 1:2 title 'positions', '-' using 1:2 title 'local attractors', '-' using 1:2 title 'global attractors'
